  • Method Details

    • visitDeclaration

      public Expression visitDeclaration​(GramaticaParser.DeclarationContext ctx)
      When a declaration is visited on the parser tree this method is invoked. Here is created a Declaration object using the type, id and number coming from the context that came as parameter. Here the types are checked as well. If the variable is declared as a int and the value is a float the method will report.
      Specified by:
      visitDeclaration in interface GramaticaVisitor<Expression>
      Overrides:
      visitDeclaration in class GramaticaBaseVisitor<Expression>
      Parameters:
      ctx - The ctx is where in the parser tree the program is currently in
      Returns:
      Returns the declaration created (note that it will return a declaration even if it wasn't added to the symbol table, so it will return declarations that may be wrong. Use these declarations with care

    • visitNumber

      public Expression visitNumber​(GramaticaParser.NumberContext ctx)
      Description copied from class: GramaticaBaseVisitor
      Visit a parse tree produced by the Number labeled alternative in GramaticaParser.expr().

      The default implementation returns the result of calling AbstractParseTreeVisitor.visitChildren(org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.RuleNode) on ctx.

      Specified by:
      visitNumber in interface GramaticaVisitor<Expression>
      Overrides:
      visitNumber in class GramaticaBaseVisitor<Expression>
      Parameters:
      ctx - the parse tree
      Returns:
      the visitor result

    • visitVariable

      public Expression visitVariable​(GramaticaParser.VariableContext ctx)
      Description copied from class: GramaticaBaseVisitor
      Visit a parse tree produced by the Variable labeled alternative in GramaticaParser.expr().

      The default implementation returns the result of calling AbstractParseTreeVisitor.visitChildren(org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.RuleNode) on ctx.

      Specified by:
      visitVariable in interface GramaticaVisitor<Expression>
      Overrides:
      visitVariable in class GramaticaBaseVisitor<Expression>
      Parameters:
      ctx - the parse tree
      Returns:
      the visitor result

    • visitOperation

      public Expression visitOperation​(GramaticaParser.OperationContext ctx)
      Once a operation is visited this method will create a operation object containing all the operands and operators.
      Specified by:
      visitOperation in interface GramaticaVisitor<Expression>
      Overrides:
      visitOperation in class GramaticaBaseVisitor<Expression>
      Parameters:
      ctx - The ctx is where in the parser tree the program is currently in
      Returns:
      Returns a operation object
